children.description: Can nest a WizardNav component for substeps (React component or element)

content.description: The content to display in the nav item (React component or element)

href.description: An optional url to use for when using an anchor component

id.description: The id for the nav item (Type: string | number)

isCurrent.description: Whether the nav item is the currently active item

isDisabled.description: Whether the nav item is disabled

isExpandable.description: Flag indicating that this NavItem has child steps and is expandable

onNavItemClick.description: Callback for when the nav item is clicked (Function: (step: number) => any)

step.description: The step passed into the onNavItemClick callback
